title: PTD Today — Media
disclaimer: Informational only — AI-generated summaries; may contain errors. Verify with the original video.

items.title: Audyt w erze AI: praktyczne zastosowania i realne korzyści | Katarzyna Chojniak, Alicja Barska

ai.summary: Based on the available description, this KPMG ON AIR podcast episode features Katarzyna Chojniak and Alicja Barska discussing praktyczne zastosowania AI w audycie — od narzędzi analizujących pełne populacje do konwersacyjnych asystentów i platformy KPMG Clara. Rozmowa obejmuje korzyści dla klientów, zmianę podejścia z próbkowania na analizę pełnych danych oraz wyzwania związane z bezpieczeństwem danych, regulacjami i kompetencjami audytorów.
bullets: Przykłady narzędzi: AI Transaction Scoring Tool, Clara AI (asystent/agencki) oraz platforma KPMG Clara i Clara for Clients.
Przejście od próbkowania do analizy pełnych populacji danych w procesie badania.
AI wspiera powtarzalne czynności, analizę dużych zbiorów danych i dokumentację ujawnień.
Omówione wyzwania: adaptacja audytorów, bezpieczeństwo danych i środowisko regulacyjne.
Całość podsumowuje wpływ technologii na rolę audytora i przyszłość AI w audycie.
takeaways: Pełna analiza populacji może dawać bardziej wszechstronną i szybszą ocenę ryzyk operacyjnych — warto uwzględnić to przy ocenie zgodności i niezawodności danych operacyjnych obiektu.
Platformy do zarządzania badaniem w czasie rzeczywistym (np. KPMG Clara) mogą poprawić koordynację i komunikację z dostawcami usług centrum danych.
Wdrożenie AI zwiększa znaczenie bezpieczeństwa danych i zgodności regulacyjnej — priorytet dla operatorów infrastruktury krytycznej.
Inwestycja w kompetencje zespołów (rozumienie narzędzi AI i interpretacji wyników) jest kluczowa, by wykorzystać korzyści audytu wspieranego AI.

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Copilot provides real-time, vision-enabled support for home projects and repairs, offering step-by-step instructions as it sees what the user sees. The feature is pitched to help with issues from leaky pipes to overflowing washing machines with clear guidance.
bullets: Real-time, visual assistance that interprets what the user sees.
Delivers step-by-step instructions for home repairs and projects.
Targets common household problems (e.g., leaky pipes, overflowing washing machines).
Focus on clear, actionable guidance for users doing repairs themselves.
takeaways: The described capability implies demand for low-latency, vision-based AI inference to deliver real-time guidance.
Handling live image/video streams suggests needs for scalable compute and network bandwidth.
Reliability and availability are critical for consumer-facing troubleshooting services.
Decision-makers should weigh edge vs. cloud deployment and capacity planning to meet responsiveness and privacy expectations.

items.title: Arknights: Endfield | 4K NVIDIA DLSS 4 Launch Trailer

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Arknights: Endfield has officially launched and the trailer highlights NVIDIA DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation. The game is a 3D real-time strategy RPG in which you play the Endministrator exploring Talos-II; the footage was captured on a GeForce RTX 5080 at 4K Ultra settings using DLSS 4 MFG 4X mode.
bullets: Official launch of Arknights: Endfield with NVIDIA DLSS 4 and Multi Frame Generation (link provided).
Game genre: 3D real-time strategy RPG; player role: Endministrator exploring Talos-II.
Trailer capture details: GeForce RTX 5080, 4K Ultra settings, DLSS 4 Multi Frame Generation 4X mode.
Developer/publisher and game links included (official site and social channels).
NVIDIA GeForce promotional and community links provided for follow-up and subscription.
takeaways: DLSS 4 with Multi Frame Generation is featured, implying workloads that leverage GPU-accelerated AI frame synthesis and require hardware supporting NVIDIA's DLSS stack (example: RTX 5080).
4K Ultra captures demonstrate significant GPU compute and memory bandwidth requirements for high‑resolution rendering and content capture workflows.
Integration of DLSS4 in a major release suggests dev/test environments should include compatible GPUs to validate performance and visual quality.
Procurement and infrastructure planning should account for driver/support compatibility and access to NVIDIA's GeForce ecosystem for testing and demonstrations.

items.title: Rate Insurance Boosts Agent Efficiency with Agentforce and Gemini

ai.summary: Based on the available description… The video shows how Rate Insurance boosts agent efficiency using Agentforce and Gemini. It also provides a link to learn more about the Google Cloud and Salesforce partnership.
bullets: Shows Rate Insurance improving agent efficiency with Agentforce and Gemini.

takeaways: Decision-makers should note this use case highlights vendor tools named Agentforce and Gemini being used to improve agent workflows.
Consider reviewing the Google Cloud–Salesforce partnership materials linked in the description for potential integration or partnership options.
Assess whether similar vendor integrations could align with operational goals for workforce efficiency.

items.title: I Travel The World And Live Rent-Free By Pet Sitting Full Time

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Charly Stoever, 35, is a financial coach who lives rent-free in Portland, Oregon, by pet sitting full time. For the past 18 months she’s been living out of two suitcases while bringing in about $60,000 a year; the profile is part of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series.
bullets: Charly Stoever, 35, is a financial coach.
She lives rent-free in Portland by pet sitting full time.
Has spent the last 18 months living out of two suitcases.
Brings in about $60,000 a year from this lifestyle.
Feature is part of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series.
takeaways: Consider workforce diversity in income sources and unconventional living arrangements when planning local staffing and retention strategies.
Assess flexible benefits or housing-related support as part of total-compensation planning in high-cost areas.
Design scheduling and remote-monitoring practices that accommodate employees with nomadic or nontraditional work/living setups.
Include local cost-of-living and gig-economy trends in labor-availability and compensation forecasting.

items.title: New CO2 Battery Stores 8 Hours of Energy

ai.summary: Based on the available description… a giant carbon dioxide "bubble" battery can store about 20 megawatts of energy. The description positions this storage technology as a way to address renewable generation fluctuations and help drive the global transition to clean energy.
bullets: Giant carbon dioxide bubble battery stores ~20 megawatts of energy
Designed to address fluctuations in renewable energy supply
Framed as a tool to support the global shift to clean energy
Presented by IEEE Spectrum
takeaways: 20 MW storage scale suggests relevance for utility-scale or large facility applications
Energy storage of this kind can help smooth renewable intermittency for grids and data centers
Decision-makers should consider emerging storage technologies as part of decarbonization and reliability planning
Further technical and commercial details would be needed to assess integration and deployment
